abilities.name: Beacon Protection
abilities.effect: As long as you have Volbeat in play, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Illumise by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that has Dark in its name.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Strange Rasping
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
